sense.name: special group
sense.commentary: COMMITTEE[+entity][+person][+group][+organization][+with_special_function] commission - a special group organized to consider some matter
sense.examples: "A committee is a group that keeps minutes and loses hours." - Milton Berle The committee will meet on Tuesday at five. They formed a committee to clean up the school after the flood.

sense.name: a dysfunctional person legally committed to the care of another
sense.examples: Because of the man's insanity, the judge decreed he would become the committee of his uncle. These retarded orphans will be committees of the state for the rest of their lives.
